mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_payment (p_name, p_time, p_regdate, p_moddate, p_storename, p_totalprice, p_cardtype, p_receipt, m_id, s_id, p_check, ptype_code) VALUES (#{pname}, #{ptime}, #{pregdate}, #{pmoddate}, #{pstorename}, #{ptotalprice}, #{pcardtype}, #{preceipt},#{mid}, #{sid}, #{pcheck}, #{ptypecode});
